org.sindice.siren.search.node

Class TwigQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.sindice.siren.search.node.NodeQuery
        • org.sindice.siren.search.node.TwigQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TupleQuery

    public class TwigQuery
extends NodeQuery
    A NodeQuery that matches a boolean combination of Ancestor-Descendant and Parent-Child node queries.

    Code taken from BooleanQuery and adapted for the Siren use case.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TwigQuery.EmptyRootQuery
      An empty root query is used to create twig query in which the root query is not specified.
      protected class  TwigQuery.TwigWeight
      Expert: the Weight for TwigQuery, used to normalize, score and explain these queries.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxClauseCount

        public static int getMaxClauseCount()
        Return the maximum number of clauses permitted, 1024 by default. Attempts to add more than the permitted number of clauses cause NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses to be thrown.
        See Also:
        setMaxClauseCount(int)

      • setMaxClauseCount

        public static void setMaxClauseCount(int maxClauseCount)
        Set the maximum number of clauses permitted per TwigQuery. Default value is 1024.

      • addRoot

        public void addRoot(NodeQuery root)
        Adds a root query.

        Overwrite the level and node constraints of the root query with the currently defined level and node constraints of the twig query.

      • addClause

        protected void addClause(NodeBooleanClause clause)
        Adds a clause to a twig query.
        Throws:
        NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses - if the new number of clauses exceeds the maximum clause number
        See Also:
        getMaxClauseCount()

      • addChild

        public void addChild(NodeQuery query,
            NodeBooleanClause.Occur occur)
        Adds a child clause to the twig query.
        Throws:
        NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses - if the new number of clauses exceeds the maximum clause number
        See Also:
        getMaxClauseCount()

      • addDescendant

        public void addDescendant(int nodeLevel,
                 NodeQuery query,
                 NodeBooleanClause.Occur occur)
        Adds a descendant clause to the twig query. The node level of the descendant is relative to the twig level.
        Throws:
        NodeBooleanQuery.TooManyClauses - if the new number of clauses exceeds the maximum clause number
        See Also:
        getMaxClauseCount()

      • setAncestorPointer

        protected void setAncestorPointer(NodeQuery ancestor)
        Description copied from class: NodeQuery
        Expert: Add a pointer to the node query ancestor

        The pointer to node query ancestor is used to retrieve node constraints from ancestors.

        Overrides:
        setAncestorPointer in class NodeQuery

      • setNodeConstraint

        public void setNodeConstraint(int lowerBound,
                     int upperBound)
        Description copied from class: NodeQuery
        Set an index interval constraint for a node. These constraints are inclusives.
        Overrides:
        setNodeConstraint in class NodeQuery

      • setLevelConstraint

        public void setLevelConstraint(int levelConstraint)
        Description copied from class: NodeQuery
        Set a constraint on the node's level

        Given that the root of the tree (level 0) is the document id, the node level constraint ranges from 1 to Integer.MAX_VALUE. A node level constraint of 0 will always return false.

        Overrides:
        setLevelConstraint in class NodeQuery

      • getRoot

        public NodeQuery getRoot()
        Return the root of this query

      • clauses

        public List<NodeBooleanClause> clauses()
        Returns the list of ancestor clauses in this query.

      • iterator

        public final Iterator<NodeBooleanClause> iterator()
        Returns an iterator on the clauses in this query. It implements the Iterable interface to make it possible to do: 
        for (SirenBooleanClause clause : booleanQuery) {}
